divs: Sighting Detailsim a truck driver and i was going west bound on I40 just coming to the top of the mt at needles ca i saw what looks like a rocket or a missile shooting into space i didn't notice anything in the sky that it would be shooting at till my co driver pointed at what looked like a star the missile never made it to the star object the weird thing about all this is that the star was slowly moving away it started real bright then it slowly got smaller and dimmer till it eventually disappeared i never saw anything in the news about it
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Needles
There were no other sightings in Needles on or around October 29th 2005
